attributes.review: What a horrible little app. The interface seems like it was created for someone with little hands

attributes.review: i got this app to see what trump was planning for the 2020 election but after a few days of having the app someone was knocking at my door. dylan o'brien had come to my door telling me to delete the app of course i did because it was dylan. he sat down with me over tea and we discussed y ✨orange✨ cheeto man was not a good person. in turn dylan was correct and that is why i rated the app one star.
attributes.title: spencer reid👹

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our lovely 🍊orange🍊in charge but it took 2 weeks to download and when I opened the app all I saw was Donald’s noodles (nudes) all over it (it’s smaller then my pinky toe. I. Am. Traumatized. Sorry not sorry.
